precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop area.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "Paste Shortcut", "New", and "Properties".

precondition: The right-click context menu is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Appearance" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Appearance" tab will remain active, and no visual changes will occur in the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active, displaying the screen saver settings.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Apply' button is active.
expected_results: The cursor will change position. The 'Apply' button may become inactive depending on the system configuration.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'None' option is selected in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The changes to the screensaver settings will be applied.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Power...' button at the bottom of the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the "Power..." button in the "Display Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will come to the foreground.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "OK" button is active.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open with the 'OK' button highlighted.
